Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Fireball, Oval, Sphere, Star-like, Unknown
trends: There has been one other sighting in Wellington
There were no other sightings in Wellington on or around September 17th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsHave unusual amount of activity in the backyard. Have noted orbs, unusual amount of planes in flight path to the international airport about a mile from here as crow flies. Unbelievably, saw a ship appear out of a haze of bright light then disappear within seconds. Counted 4 shooting stars in a one hour period -one of which had a red tail just before seeing the ship. I have a small window on the universe but I cannot believe what is happening in my backyard.There seems to be several unusual star-like objects that hover above -One in particular that is stationary flashing multicolor lights. This one appears nightly. This all happened in one of viewing over a three to four hour period.I am now watching nightly when clear because they are concentrated in the area.
